name: Dont Press The Button
description:
I made this over 4 days, a simple prototype of something I had in mind, though I am not great at coding so I thought to make do-able with the skills I have with code, it's not too mechanically diverse, if not at all, with just being a small survival of how long you can avoid pressing the button for.

*Note I have not tested other aspect ratios apart from 16:9, so if you experience any issues, at least you know why.

- I also forgot to include a Quit button, use Alt-F4 to quit the game when you're bored with it.
